mdRecord.dcterms:title: U.S. Army nurse's uniform from World War II
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This uniform was worn by Ruth Beery, chief nurse of the U.S. Army 8th Evacuation Hospital unit, during World War II. Light olive green uniform composed of button-down shirt with two breast pockets and pants; shirt: Ruth Beery sewn into collar, C[A]5242M tacked inside front; pants: 6081-3 W tacked to waistband.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Uniforms
World War, 1939-1945
United States. Army. Evacuation Hospital, 8th
